products.name: UltraVision 4K Smart TV 55-inch
products.description: Experience cinematic entertainment with stunning 4K Ultra HD resolution, quantum dot technology delivering over 1 billion colors, and HDR10+ support for exceptional contrast. Built-in Android TV 12 provides seamless access to Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video, and thousands of apps. Advanced 120Hz refresh rate ensures smooth motion for sports and gaming.
products.short_description: 55-inch 4K Smart TV with quantum dot technology, Android TV, and 120Hz refresh rate
features: Voice control with Google Assistant and Alexa
Gaming mode with VRR and ALLM
Auto low latency mode for gaming
Filmmaker mode for authentic cinema experience

products.name: SoundWave Pro Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in studio-quality sound with adaptive active noise cancellation that intelligently adjusts to your environment. Premium 40mm dynamic drivers deliver rich bass, crystal-clear mids, and sparkling highs across the entire 20Hz-40kHz frequency range. Industry-leading 40-hour battery life ensures uninterrupted listening for days. Luxurious memory foam ear cushions and lightweight design provide all-day comfort for travel, work, or leisure.
products.short_description: Premium wireless headphones with adaptive ANC, 40-hour battery, and studio-quality sound
features: Adaptive ANC with wind noise reduction
Foldable design with premium hard case
Touch controls for music and calls

products.name: SmartHome Hub Pro Central Controller
products.description: Universal smart home hub supporting over 5,000 devices with Zigbee, Z-Wave, WiFi, Bluetooth, and Matter protocols. Create automation routines, monitor energy usage, and control everything with voice commands or mobile app. Local processing ensures privacy and fast response times.
products.short_description: Universal smart home hub supporting 5000+ devices with voice control and energy monitoring

products.name: PowerBook Ultra 15-inch Professional Laptop
products.description: High-performance laptop with 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA RTX 4060 graphics, and 32GB RAM. Features stunning 15.6-inch 165Hz display with 100% sRGB color accuracy. All-day 90Wh battery keeps you productive anywhere. Perfect for professionals and content creators.
products.short_description: Professional laptop with i7 processor, RTX 4060 graphics, and 12-hour battery

products.name: FitTrack Pro Advanced Fitness Smartwatch
products.description: Advanced fitness smartwatch with comprehensive health monitoring including heart rate, SpO2, and sleep tracking. Features GPS for accurate activity tracking, 100+ sport modes, and 7-day battery life. 5ATM water resistance makes it perfect for swimming and all-weather activities.
products.short_description: Fitness smartwatch with GPS, health monitoring, and 7-day battery life

products.name: StreamCam 4K Pro Professional Webcam
products.description: Professional 4K webcam with AI-powered auto-framing and face tracking. Superior low-light performance and HDR ensure you look great in any environment. Dual omnidirectional microphones with noise reduction deliver crystal-clear audio. Perfect for content creators, streamers, and remote professionals.
products.short_description: Professional 4K webcam with AI auto-framing, HDR, and dual microphones

products.name: ChargePad 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Station
products.description: Elegant 3-in-1 wireless charging station for phone, smartwatch, and earbuds. Fast 15W charging with MagSafe compatibility. Premium aluminum and tempered glass construction. Advanced safety features including foreign object detection and overheat protection ensure safe charging.
products.short_description: 3-in-1 wireless charging station with 15W fast charging and premium design

products.name: GamePad Elite Pro Wireless Controller
products.description: Pro-grade wireless gaming controller with Hall effect analog sticks for zero drift, mechanical buttons for precise inputs, and customizable back paddles. Hair-trigger locks reduce trigger travel for faster shooting. 40-hour battery life and universal compatibility across PC, console, and mobile platforms.
products.short_description: Pro wireless gaming controller with Hall effect sticks, 40-hour battery, and universal compatibility

products.name: PortaPower 20000mAh High-Capacity Power Bank
products.description: High-capacity 20000mAh portable charger with 65W fast charging capability. Features multiple ports including USB-C PD for laptops, tablets, and phones. Digital LED display shows exact battery percentage. TSA-approved for air travel with advanced safety protections.
products.short_description: 20000mAh power bank with 65W fast charging and digital display

products.name: EcoSmart LED Desk Lamp with Wireless Charging
products.description: Modern LED desk lamp with integrated wireless charging pad and USB port. Features adjustable color temperature (3000K-6500K), multiple brightness levels, and memory function. Eye-care technology reduces flicker and blue light. Touch controls and flexible gooseneck design for perfect positioning.
products.short_description: LED desk lamp with wireless charging, adjustable color temperature, and eye-care technology

products.name: BoomBox 360 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Premium portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and deep bass. IPX7 waterproof rating perfect for pool parties and outdoor adventures. 24-hour battery life, PartyBoost technology to connect multiple speakers, and built-in power bank to charge your devices.
products.short_description: 360-degree portable speaker with 24-hour battery, IPX7 waterproof, and power bank

products.name: ActionCam Pro 4K Sports Camera
products.description: Professional 4K action camera with advanced image stabilization and waterproof housing. Capture stunning footage at 60fps with HDR and slow-motion capabilities up to 240fps. Voice control, live streaming, and 2-inch touchscreen make it perfect for extreme sports and adventures.
products.short_description: 4K action camera with image stabilization, waterproof to 33ft, and voice control

products.name: NutriBlend Smart High-Speed Blender
products.description: Professional-grade smart blender with 1200W motor and precision blade system. Features 10 speed settings, pre-programmed modes for smoothies, soups, and nut butters. Self-cleaning function and BPA-free Tritan jar. Smart app connectivity for recipes and nutritional tracking.
products.short_description: 1200W smart blender with 10 speeds, pre-programmed modes, and app connectivity

products.name: RoadGuard 2K Dual Dash Camera System
products.description: Advanced dual-channel dash camera with 2K front and 1080p rear recording. Features night vision, parking mode, GPS tracking, and G-sensor for accident detection. Built-in WiFi for easy footage transfer to smartphone. Loop recording with 256GB card support ensures continuous protection.
products.short_description: Dual dash camera with 2K front, 1080p rear, night vision, and GPS tracking

products.name: BodySync Smart Scale with Body Composition Analysis
products.description: Advanced smart scale that measures 15 body composition metrics including weight, BMI, body fat, muscle mass, bone mass, and more. Bluetooth and WiFi connectivity syncs data to smartphone app with unlimited user profiles. Precision sensors and large LED display. Compatible with Apple Health, Google Fit, and Fitbit.
products.short_description: Smart scale with 15 body metrics, WiFi/Bluetooth sync, and unlimited users

products.name: UltraView 27-inch 4K Professional Monitor
products.description: Professional 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with IPS panel delivering 99% sRGB color accuracy. Features USB-C connectivity with 65W power delivery, built-in KVM switch, and ergonomic stand with height, tilt, swivel, and pivot adjustments. Perfect for designers, photographers, and professionals demanding color precision.
products.short_description: 27-inch 4K IPS monitor with USB-C 65W PD, 99% sRGB, and ergonomic stand

products.name: HomeGuard 2K Indoor Security Camera
products.description: Advanced 2K indoor security camera with AI-powered person detection, two-way audio, and night vision. Features 360-degree pan and tilt coverage, motion tracking, and cloud/local storage options. Works with Alexa and Google Assistant for voice control and smart home integration.
products.short_description: 2K security camera with AI detection, 360° pan/tilt, night vision, and two-way audio

products.name: MeshWave AX6000 Tri-Band WiFi 6 Router
products.description: Enterprise-grade tri-band WiFi 6 mesh router with 6000 Mbps combined speed. Covers up to 3500 sq ft with seamless roaming. Advanced QoS prioritizes gaming and streaming traffic. Eight high-gain antennas and beamforming technology ensure strong signal throughout your home. Includes robust parental controls and network security features.
products.short_description: Tri-band WiFi 6 router with 6000Mbps speed, 3500 sq ft coverage, and advanced QoS

products.name: MagShield Pro Magnetic Phone Case with Stand
products.description: Premium magnetic phone case with military-grade drop protection and built-in kickstand. Strong MagSafe compatibility ensures secure wireless charging and accessory attachment. Raised bezels protect camera and screen. Antimicrobial coating keeps case hygienically clean.

products.name: CreatePro A1 FDM 3D Printer
products.description: Professional FDM 3D printer with auto-leveling, direct drive extruder, and flexible build plate. Large 300x300x340mm build volume handles most projects. products.short_description: FDM 3D printer with 300x300x340mm build volume, auto-leveling, and WiFi connectivity

products.name: DrawMaster Pro 13.3-inch Graphics Tablet with Display

Wide color gamut covers 92% Adobe RGB for accurate color work. Fully laminated screen eliminates parallax. Compatible with all major creative software.
products.short_description: 13.3-inch pen display with 8192 pressure levels, 92% Adobe RGB, and tilt support

products.name: TurboSpeed 2TB Portable NVMe SSD
products.description: Ultra-fast portable NVMe SSD with Thunderbolt 3 and USB-C connectivity delivering up to 2800MB/s read speeds. Rugged aluminum housing with IP65 water and dust resistance. Hardware encryption protects sensitive data. Compact pocket-sized design perfect for photographers, videographers, and professionals on the go.
products.short_description: 2TB portable NVMe SSD with 2800MB/s speeds, Thunderbolt 3, and IP65 protection

products.short_description: 360° video baby monitor with 5-inch HD screen, two-way audio, and 1000ft range

products.name: eReader Pro 7-inch E-Ink Display with Warm Light

Stores up to 16GB (thousands of books) with weeks of battery life. Supports multiple formats including EPUB, PDF, MOBI, and audiobooks via Bluetooth.

Avoids obstacles with AI recognition, works on carpets and hard floors, and integrates with smart home systems for scheduled cleaning.
products.short_description: Robot vacuum and mop with LiDAR, 4000Pa suction, auto-empty base, and AI obstacle avoidance

products.name: DigitalChef 8-Quart Dual Zone Air Fryer

Features 12 preset cooking functions and dishwasher-safe components for easy cleanup.
products.short_description: 8-quart dual zone air fryer with independent controls and 12 cooking presets

specifications.smart_sync: Finish both zones at same time

products.name: AlpineTrail 4-Person Instant Setup Camping Tent
products.description: Premium 4-person instant setup tent assembles in 60 seconds with pre-attached poles. Waterproof 3000mm rainfly and sealed seams keep you dry. Large interior with 6ft center height and two doors for easy access. Includes gear loft, lantern hook, and multiple storage pockets. Perfect for family camping and festivals.
products.short_description: 4-person instant tent with 60-second setup, waterproof 3000mm, and 6ft height

products.name: QuickBoil Elite Electric Kettle with Temperature Control
products.description: Premium stainless steel electric kettle with precise temperature control for perfect tea and coffee brewing. Six preset temperatures from 160°F to 212°F. Keep-warm function maintains temperature for 30 minutes. Rapid boil technology heats 1.7L in under 5 minutes. LED display and quiet operation.
products.short_description: 1.7L electric kettle with 6 temperature presets, keep-warm, and rapid boil

products.name: FitWalk Pro 2-in-1 Folding Treadmill with Desk
products.description: Innovative 2-in-1 treadmill converts from walking desk to running machine. Space-saving folding design stores vertically. Powerful 2.5HP motor supports speeds up to 7.5 MPH. Built-in LED work light and emergency flasher. Includes multiple nozzle adapters for tires, bikes, sports equipment, and inflatables. Rechargeable battery and 12V car adapter.

products.name: SmartSpray 8-Zone WiFi Irrigation Controller

products.name: AutoFeeder Pro 6L Smart Pet Feeder with Camera

products.short_description: 6L smart pet feeder with 1080p camera, two-way audio, and 10 meals/day scheduling

specifications.feeding_duration: Up to 3 weeks for cats, 2 weeks for small dogs

products.name: GameView Elite 27-inch 165Hz QHD Gaming Monitor

Features AMD FreeSync Premium and G-Sync compatibility for tear-free gaming. 95% DCI-P3 color coverage delivers stunning visuals. HDR400 certification enhances contrast. Ergonomic stand with full adjustability and RGB lighting on back.
products.short_description: 27-inch QHD gaming monitor with 165Hz, 1ms response, FreeSync Premium, and HDR400

products.description: Professional 20V cordless drill and impact driver combo with brushless motors for longer runtime and durability. Drill delivers 500 in-lbs torque with 2-speed transmission. Impact driver produces 1,500 in-lbs for driving large fasteners. Includes two 2.0Ah lithium batteries, fast charger, and heavy-duty carrying bag.

PID temperature control ensures consistent extraction.
products.short_description: 15-bar automatic espresso machine with one-touch operation and automatic milk frother

products.name: StudioGlow 18-inch LED Ring Light with Tripod Stand
products.description: Professional 18-inch LED ring light with adjustable color temperature (3200K-5600K) and dimmable brightness. 240 LED bulbs provide even, flattering illumination for videos and photos. products.short_description: 18-inch LED ring light with adjustable color temp, tripod, and Bluetooth remote

products.name: VacPro Handheld Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: Powerful 150W cordless handheld vacuum with cyclonic suction technology. 9000Pa strong suction tackles pet hair, crumbs, and debris. Lightweight 2.2 lbs design with 30-minute runtime. HEPA filtration captures 99.97% of allergens. Includes multiple attachments for versatile cleaning. Wall-mountable charging dock keeps everything organized.
products.short_description: 150W cordless handheld vacuum with 9000Pa suction, HEPA filter, and 30-min runtime

products.name: MechKeys Pro TKL Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
products.description: Premium tenkeyless mechanical gaming keyboard with hot-swappable switches and per-key RGB lighting. Durable aluminum frame with double-shot PBT keycaps. Features full N-key rollover, 1000Hz polling rate, and programmable macros. Detachable USB-C cable for portability. Software allows custom lighting effects and key remapping.
products.short_description: TKL mechanical keyboard with hot-swap switches, per-key RGB, and aluminum frame

products.name: FitBand Advanced Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Monitor
products.description: Comprehensive fitness tracker with 24/7 heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 14 sport modes. Large AMOLED color display shows notifications, calls, and fitness metrics. 10-day battery life and 5ATM water resistance. Tracks steps, calories, distance, and provides guided breathing exercises. Syncs with iOS and Android apps.
products.short_description: Fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, AMOLED display, 10-day battery, and 14 sport modes

products.name: SoundStage 5.1 Dolby Atmos Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer
products.description: Premium 5.1 channel soundbar system with Dolby Atmos and DTS:X for immersive 3D audio. 11 drivers including upward-firing speakers create overhead sound effects. Wireless 8-inch subwoofer delivers deep bass. HDMI eARC, 4K pass-through, and multiple connectivity options. Voice enhancement mode for crystal-clear dialogue.
products.short_description: 5.1 Dolby Atmos soundbar with wireless subwoofer, upward-firing speakers, and HDMI eARC

products.name: PrecisionPro Lightweight Gaming Mouse
products.description: Ultra-lightweight wired gaming mouse weighing only 65g with honeycomb shell design. High-precision 16000 DPI optical sensor with adjustable settings. 7 programmable buttons and customizable RGB lighting. Flexible braided cable and ultra-smooth PTFE feet. Software allows custom profiles and macros for competitive gaming.
products.short_description: 65g lightweight gaming mouse with 16000 DPI sensor, 7 programmable buttons, and RGB

products.name: ChefMate 12-Cup Food Processor with Multiple Attachments
products.description: Professional 12-cup food processor with powerful 720W motor handles tough ingredients. Includes stainless steel S-blade, shredding disc, slicing disc, and dough blade. Wide feed tube accommodates whole fruits and vegetables. Pulse function for precise control. BPA-free bowl with pour spout and safety interlocks.
products.short_description: 12-cup food processor with 720W motor, 4 blades/discs, and wide feed tube

products.name: TabletMax 10.5-inch Android Tablet
products.description: Premium 10.5-inch Android tablet with 2K display and octa-core processor. 6GB RAM and 128GB storage expandable to 1TB. Quad speakers with Dolby Atmos for immersive audio. 8MP front and 13MP rear cameras. Long-lasting 7500mAh battery with 18W fast charging. Includes protective case and stylus pen.
products.short_description: 10.5-inch Android tablet with 2K display, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, and stylus

products.name: SlimTrack Digital Bathroom Scale with High Precision
products.description: High-precision digital bathroom scale with large backlit LCD display. Accurate measurements up to 400 lbs with 0.2 lb increments. Tempered glass platform with anti-slip surface. Auto-calibration and instant readings. Step-on technology activates scale automatically. Low battery and overload indicators. Sleek modern design complements any bathroom.
products.short_description: Digital bathroom scale with 400 lb capacity, 0.2 lb precision, and backlit display

products.name: UltraLink 8K HDMI 2.1 Cable 10 Feet
products.description: Premium certified 8K HDMI 2.1 cable supporting 8K@60Hz and 4K@120Hz for next-gen gaming and entertainment. Ultra High Speed 48Gbps bandwidth ensures flawless transmission. Supports Dynamic HDR, eARC, VRR, ALLM, and QFT. Gold-plated connectors and durable braided construction. Perfect for PS5, Xbox Series X, Apple TV, and 8K TVs.
products.short_description: Certified 8K HDMI 2.1 cable with 48Gbps bandwidth, 10ft length, braided design

products.name: HydroTrack Smart Water Bottle with Hydration Reminder
products.description: Intelligent insulated water bottle tracks hydration with LED glow reminders. Vacuum-insulated stainless steel keeps drinks cold 24 hours or hot 12 hours. Touch-sensor lid displays water intake progress. Syncs with mobile app for personalized hydration goals. BPA-free, leak-proof, and dishwasher safe. Perfect for gym, office, and travel.
products.short_description: 32oz smart water bottle with LED reminders, app sync, and 24-hour insulation

products.name: TrailTrek 40L Hiking Backpack with Hydration System
products.description: Versatile 40-liter hiking backpack with ventilated back panel and adjustable suspension system. Multiple compartments include laptop sleeve, hydration reservoir pocket, and external gear attachments. Water-resistant 600D polyester with rain cover included. Padded shoulder straps and hip belt distribute weight comfortably. Perfect for day hikes, travel, and camping.
products.short_description: 40L hiking backpack with hydration system, ventilated back, and rain cover

products.name: SlowChef 7-Quart Programmable Slow Cooker
products.description: Large 7-quart programmable slow cooker with digital timer and temperature control. Cook-and-carry locking lid prevents spills during transport. Three temperature settings (Low, High, Warm) with auto-switch to warm. Removable oval stoneware insert is dishwasher safe. Perfect for family meals, batch cooking, and entertaining.
products.short_description: 7-quart programmable slow cooker with locking lid, digital timer, and auto-warm

products.name: CinemaView 1080p Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth
products.description: Portable 1080p mini projector with 5000 lumens brightness and native Full HD resolution. Built-in WiFi for wireless screen mirroring and Bluetooth for audio connectivity. Projects up to 200-inch screen with keystone correction and focus adjustment. Dual speakers provide decent audio. Perfect for home theater, outdoor movies, and presentations.
products.short_description: 1080p mini projector with 5000 lumens, WiFi mirroring, Bluetooth, and 200-inch display

products.name: SecureBox Biometric Fingerprint Safe with Alarm
products.description: Advanced biometric fingerprint safe with capacity for 20 fingerprints and backup keypad entry. Solid steel construction with anti-pry design and built-in alarm system. Interior LED lighting and removable shelf provide flexible storage. Pre-drilled holes for wall or floor mounting. Battery-powered with low battery alert and backup emergency keys.
products.short_description: Biometric safe with 20 fingerprint capacity, alarm system, and solid steel construction
